title: Calories in Starbucks Almond Milk
meta_description: Learn calories in Starbucks almond milk per 8 oz serving, including carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and nutrition tweaks for drinks.
assumptions: Unsweetened almond milk as used by Starbucks in beverages; 8 oz (240 ml) serving size; no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, supplier, and exact formulation; sweetened versions or mixes increase values. Check Starbucks app or labels.

quick_answer.text: An 8 oz serving of Starbucks almond milk provides ~36 kcal with minimal carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged almond milks.

tweaks.label: In a latte (add espresso, no syrup)
With vanilla syrup (1 pump per serving)

faqs.q: How many calories in 8 oz Starbucks almond milk?
faqs.a: About 36 kcal for an unsweetened 8 oz serving.

faqs.q: Is Starbucks almond milk low carb?
faqs.a: Yes, ~1.2 g carbs per 8 oz, mostly from natural sources with 0.7 g fiber.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in Starbucks almond milk?
faqs.a: Approximately 2.9 g total fat per 8 oz, with 0.2 g saturated.

faqs.q: Does Starbucks almond milk have protein?
faqs.a: Minimal, about 1.2 g per 8 oz serving.

faqs.q: How does sweetened Starbucks almond milk compare?
faqs.a: Adds ~20 kcal and sugars; check for flavored or barista versions.
